description: Writing a good summary (description) is hard,                let the Open Text Summarier (OTS) do the heavy lifting.                This tool extracts a summary of the content and sets it                as the description of the content item you added
longdescription: Writing a good summary (description) is hard,                let the Open Text Summarier (OTS) do the heavy lifting.                This tool extracts a summary of the content and sets it                as the description of the content item you added
